SourceString: Oh hello,{PC}!\nIt's good to see that you've come!\n<br_break>

Hmm. It seems like you don't have any
subjugation request forms yet. Come see me again
after you find one.
<end>

Hmm. It seems like you don't have any friends
with subjugation requests. Come back
when you meet some people with subjugation forms.
<end>
There doesn't seem to be any subjugation\nrequests underway at the moment.
Do you want to form a subjugation team\nto fulfill the request?
Oh you don't want to after all?\nWell, let me know if you change your mind.\n<end>
Choose the request you want to fulfill.\n<break>
Choose a friend to join the subjugation team.\n<break>
That person is already part\nof the subjugation team.\n<br_break>
Is this the team you want to use\nfor the subjugation request? sub\n<yesno><break>
There is still more space on the team.\nAre you sure you want to continue?\n<yesno 2><break>
Okay, we'll get the job done.\nCheck back in around {Subjugation_Time_Remain_Hour} hours and  {Subjugation_Time_Remain_Minute} minutes.\n<end>
The subjugation team has returned.\nHere is your reward.\n<br_break>

Hmm. It looks like you can't hold any more
{Subjugation_Reward_Name}.　Please return after you have had a chance
to sort out your bag.
<end>
Do you want to assemble a strike team\nto fulfill the subjugation request? \n<yesno><break>

Okay, well let me know if you change your
mind. I look forward to seeing you again
when you're ready to take on a request.
<end>
It looks like the strike team is on their way\nto eliminate the threat as we speak.\n<br_break>
They should return in around　{Subjugation_Time_Remain_Hour} hours and\n {Subjugation_Time_Remain_Minute} minutes. Check back around then.\n<br_break>

Do you want to call off the mission
and have the strike team return?
You won't receive any kind of reward.
<yesno 2><break>

Okay I'll call them back.
Do you want to assemble a team to
take on another subjugation request?
<yesno><break>

Okay. The strike team should return in around
{Subjugation_Time_Remain_Hour} hours and {Subjugation_Time_Remain_Minute} minutes.

<end>
When you get another request form\nlet me know. I'd be happy to help \nyou out with your next subjugation.<end>
Hmph. Looks like you can't accept the\n{Subjugation_Reward_Name} as your reward.\n<br_break>
Do you want to complete the request\nwithout receiving a reward?\n<yesno 2><break>
You gave up the reward.\nI'll go ahead and complete the request now.\n<br_break>

Please sort out your messy bag.
Until then, I'll hold onto your reward
for you.
<end>
